publ: by Sahar Andrade - Reinvent Yourself to Greatness
name: ReinventYourselfandovercomeyourfear
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you are like most professionals that have achieved either few wins or success; but regardless feel stuck not knowing what to do next, burned out, stressed, anxious, overwhelmed, anxious or even asking yourself if are are good enough, you are nor alone
Our default as human beings is to fear the loss of our comfort as regular pay check for example no matter how miserable we are in that job, or the fear to ask for that promotion or raise, or start that business that you have been dreaming off, or travel, or leave a toxic relationship, you trade the devil that you know...
You are ready to go to the next level in personal life, career, development, business, or relationships but you feel stuck and trapped; again you are not alone and you need to take action NOW rather than wait for year after year to pass and you are still in the same place, though you know you deserve better

I know what you are thinking: “I work hard eventually they will notice and I will get that promotion I so deserve” or you believe in “Build it and they will come” or “sooner or later someone will get me”– 
I have news for you – it doesn’t work that way – if it did you would have been where you deserve to be.
Don’t get me started on the myths of gender equality, pay equality, glass ceiling or womanpreneurs needing a man’s help to succeed.

Let me just say this, I know how you feel I have been there, I found the way to achieve THE breakthrough, based on the learning, knowledge, and practice acquired from over 16,000 hours studying psychiatry, leadership development, self-branding, and entrepreneurship as well as building two successful businesses.

My tips guide you help you get the skills that need to move you higher from where you are to where you always dreamed to be.
I will guide you through your transformation overcoming self-doubts and limiting beliefs, facing your fears, reinventing yourself from the inside out, change your mindset and champion your breakthrough to get from where you are stuck to where you want to get achieving your success. 

My tips will help you get unstuck of your Status Quo and comfort zone that is preventing you from reaching your greatness 
What have you got to lose follow my tips for a week, most importantly try to apply them bit by bit. I will offer tips also on how to replace bad habits with good ones (A new habit takes 21 to 30 days t become automatic), increase your personal productivity and ascend to be the person you always knew you could be.
We all have a genius and light inside of us- let us find yours and bring it to life.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
